text: "I Just Cut Myself" is a song recorded by American country music artist Ronnie McDowell. It was released in May 1982 as the first single from the album Love to Burn. The song reached #11 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles & Tracks chart. The song was written by Chance Jones and Mike Lantrip. ==Chart performance== {|class="wikitable sortable" !align="left"|Chart (1982) !align="center"|Peak position |- |- |align="left"|Canadian RPM Country Tracks |align="center"|24 |} ==References== Category:1982 singles Category:1982 songs Category:Ronnie McDowell songs Category:Song recordings produced by Buddy Killen Category:Epic Records singles
title: I Just Cut Myself
